attributes.action: stop attempting to tax Uk residents over global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global warming is a natural cyclical event caused by sun spot activity: it is being used by goverments to raise taxes that are not justified. The undersigned will not accept this governmental con being foisted on the Uk population.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
